title: UPA Kenya - Gusii Based Political Party Unveiled
description:
KISII, Kenya, October 25, 2021 â€“ United Progressive Alliance (UPA) has commenced popularization drive in the Gusii region targeting to register over 500,000 members. 
The Party Secretary-General John Obwocha said the founders of the party intend to make it the party of choice for candidates vying for various seats in Kisii and Nyamira counties in the 2022 general election.Speaking during a press conference in Kisii Town after a youth meeting, Obwocha said that the party had the support of influential people from the Gusii region with an intention of having many Members of Parliament and Members of County Assembly in the region.
